document.discussion_title: ‘I am better than that’ Nenshi apologizes to council for anti-Uber rant – CTV News | 757Live Network
document.topic_text: ‘I am better than that’ Nenshi apologizes to council for anti-Uber rant – CTV News April 26, 2016 CTVNews.ca Staff Published Monday, April 25, 2016 8:28AM EDT Last Updated Monday, April 25, 2016 2:08PM EDT Calgary Mayor Naheed Nenshi faced some tough… 'I am better than that': Nenshi apologizes to council for anti-Uber rant Calgary Mayor Naheed Nenshi faced some tough questions during a council meeting on Monday after he was recorded slamming ride-hailing service Uber and calling the company's CEO a "dick."
document.post: ‘I am better than that’ Nenshi apologizes to council for anti-Uber rant – CTV News April 26, 2016 CTVNews.ca Staff Published Monday, April 25, 2016 8:28AM EDT Last Updated Monday, April 25, 2016 2:08PM EDT Calgary Mayor Naheed Nenshi faced some tough… 'I am better than that': Nenshi apologizes to council for anti-Uber rant Calgary Mayor Naheed Nenshi faced some tough questions during a council meeting on Monday after he was recorded slamming ride-hailing service Uber and calling the company's CEO a "dick."
